title: Definitions
context: [ยง323B-2] Definitions. As used in this chapter: &ldquo;Breach&rdquo; has the same meaning as in 45 Code of Federal Regulations section 164.402, as may be amended. &ldquo;Business associate&rdquo; has the same meaning as in 45 Code of Federal Regulations section 160.103, as may be amended. &ldquo;Covered entity&rdquo; has the same meaning as in 45 Code of Federal Regulations section 160.103, as may be amended. &ldquo;Disclosure&rdquo; has the same meaning as in 45 Code of Federal Regulations section 160.103, as may be amended. &ldquo;Health information&rdquo; has the same meaning as in 45 Code of Federal Regulations section 160.103, as may be amended. &ldquo;Individually identifiable health information&rdquo; has the same meaning as in 45 Code of Federal Regulations section 160.103, as may be amended. &ldquo;Unsecured protected health information&rdquo; has the same meaning as in 45 Code of Federal Regulations section 164.402, as may be amended. &ldquo;Use&rdquo; has the same meaning as in 45 Code of Federal Regulations section 160.103, as may be amended. [L 2012, c 315, pt of ยง2]
